title: Tin - leading companies worldwide based on production output 2017
yAxis: Production output in thousand metric tons
summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Largest Tin Producers, and Production output in thousand metric tons in each Largest Tin Producers on the y axis.
The Production output in thousand metric tons is appeared to be the highest at Largest Tin Producers Yunnan Tin (China) and lowest at Largest Tin Producers Gejiu Zi-Li (China).
The highest Largest Tin Producers Yunnan Tin (China) has 65.8 more Production output in thousand metric tons than the lowest Largest Tin Producers Gejiu Zi-Li (China).
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Production output in thousand metric tons for 10 number of Largest Tin Producerss.

The maximum Production output in thousand metric tons 74.5 is found at Largest Tin Producers Yunnan Tin (China) and the minimum is found at Gejiu Zi-Li (China) where Production output in thousand metric tons is 8.7.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Largest Tin Producers, and Production output in thousand metric tons in each Largest Tin Producers on the y axis.
The Production output in thousand metric tons is appeared to be the highest at Largest Tin Producers Yunnan Tin (China) and lowest at Largest Tin Producers Gejiu Zi-Li (China).
The highest Largest Tin Producers Yunnan Tin (China) has 65.8 more Production output in thousand metric tons than the lowest Largest Tin Producers Gejiu Zi-Li (China).
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Largest Tin Producers in the x axis and Production output in thousand metric tons in the y axis.

The maximum Production output in thousand metric tons 74.5 is found at Largest Tin Producers Yunnan Tin (China) and the minimum is found at Gejiu Zi-Li (China) where Production output in thousand metric tons is 8.7.
The minimum Largest Tin Producers Gejiu Zi-Li (China) has got 8.56 times less Production output in thousand metric tons than the maximum Largest Tin Producers Yunnan Tin (China).
Production output in thousand metric tons at Largest Tin Producers Yunnan Tin (China) is 74.5 , second place is  at 74.5, and thirdly is Malaysia Smelting Corporation (Malaysia) at 27.2.
The Largest Tin Producers Gejiu Zi-Li (China) tends to be 3.24 percent lower than average.
The Production output in thousand metric tons is 229.8 if we add up values of all Largest Tin Producerss.
